TestCase.Title: Test case EID_CLIENT_D_02
TestCase.Purpose: This test case evaluates the mandatory information from the Phase 1 of the EAC protocol displayed to the user prior to the PIN entry.

Command.Text: Invoke the Online-Authentication including age verification as described in .

TestStep.Description: The age verification is initiated by the "AuthenticatedAuxiliaryData" element used in the EAC1InputType message.

ExpectedResult.Text: The eID-Client extracts the data transmitted from the eID-Service during the Phase 1 of the EAC and presents it to the user.
The eID-Client displays the holder of the certificate as contained in the "CertificateDescription" (SubjectName and SubjectURL).
The eID-Client displays the intended comparison data from "AuthenticatedAuxiliaryData" for age verification.
The age verification data shown to the user is the same as the data requested by the eID-Server during the Terminal Authentication in "AuthenticatedAuxiliaryData".
The user is required to enter the PIN of the eID-Card after the data was presented.
